    A

    acceptClientConnection(SelectionKey) - Method in class ServerHandler
    Attempts to accept a connection from a client app.

    C

    ChatBot - Class in Unnamed Package
    Module that manages access to the external ChatBot API.
    ChatBot() - Constructor for class ChatBot
     
    ClientAttachment - Class in Unnamed Package
    Used to keep track of things related to a connection, by attaching this kind of object to SelectionKeys.
    ClientAttachment() - Constructor for class ClientAttachment
    Constructor of the ClientAttachment.
    closeServerConnection() - Method in class ServerHandler
    Attempts to close the connection with the server.

    G

    getAndIncConnectionNextId() - Static method in class ClientAttachment
    Retrieves the connectionId of the client and increments just after that.
    getConnectionId() - Method in class ClientAttachment
    Retrieves the connectionId of the client.
    getInstance() - Static method in class ServerHandler
    Retrives the ServerHandler object (Singleton in _instance property).
    getResponse(String) - Static method in class ChatBot
    Asks our ChatBot's response to some message.

    I

    initServer(boolean) - Method in class ServerHandler
    Inits the server.
    isProcessing() - Method in class ClientAttachment
    Checks if the client is already processing something (read/write)

    M

    main(String[]) - Static method in class Main
    Entry point of the program (function that is called).
    Main - Class in Unnamed Package
    Class (and file) to be used to launch the server application.
    Main() - Constructor for class Main
     

    P

    prompt - Static variable in class ChatBot
    The variable that contains the prompt message for the ChatBot.

    R

    readFromClient(SelectionKey) - Method in class ServerHandler
    Attempts to read a message from the client.
    run() - Method in class ServerHandler
    When the ServerHandler is used in a Thread as a Runnable, it enters an infinite loop handling events between the server and clients.

    S

    ServerHandler - Class in Unnamed Package
    Class that manages the server side and its connection to any client.
    ServerHandler() - Constructor for class ServerHandler
    Default constructor of the ServerHandler object (defines initServer as true).
    ServerHandler(boolean) - Constructor for class ServerHandler
    Constructor of the ServerHandler object that immediately uses the initServer() method.
    setProcessing() - Method in class ClientAttachment
    By default, registers the connection as processing something.
    setProcessing(boolean) - Method in class ClientAttachment
    Registers the connection as processing something or not.

    U

    unsetProcessing() - Method in class ClientAttachment
    Registers the connection as not processing anything.

    W

    writeToClient(SelectionKey) - Method in class ServerHandler
    By default asks the ChatBot to input some message if none was passed as a parameter.
    writeToClient(SelectionKey, String) - Method in class ServerHandler
    Attempts to send a String message to a client.
